title: Impact of the Pandemic on Learner Behavioral Characteristics and CoI-Based Distance Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using basic digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Blended course design applying Community of Inquiry (CoI) principles to language learning (English as a foreign language) conducted in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze their post-pandemic learning behavior patterns (e.g., shifts in social expectations, increased self-directedness).
Learners enhance collaborative problem-solving skills by participating in online discussions based on the CoI (Social, Cognitive, Teaching Presence) framework.
Learners establish and implement self-regulated learning strategies while completing Moodle-based assignments in a smartphone environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
